#configure directories
set (SDL2_MODULE_PATH "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/lib")
set (SDL2_LIBRARY_SRC_PATH  "${LIBRARY_MODULE_PATH}/src" )
set (SDL2_LIBRARY_INCLUDE_PATH  "${LIBRARY_MODULE_PATH}/include")

#set includes
include_directories (${SDL2_LIBRARY_INCLUDE_PATH} ${THIRD_PARTY_INCLUDE_PATH})

#set library
add_library (SDL2 STATIC ${SDL2_SOURCE_FILES} ${SDL2_HEADER_FILES} include/*.h)

#export vars
set (SDL2_LIBRARY_INCLUDE_PATH  ${THIRD_PARTY_INCLUDE_PATH} PARENT_SCOPE)
